§ 51905. Flags and grave markers Except as authorized under another law, the Secretary of Transportation may issue, at no cost, a flag of the United States and a grave marker to the family or personal representative of a deceased individual who served in the merchant marine of the United States in support of the armed forces of the United States or its allies during a war or national emergency. (Pub. L. 109–304, § 8(b), Oct. 6, 2006, 120 Stat. 1585.)
